subject: Re: Your Fresca is terrific!
body:
On Feb. 08, at 10:03 PM, Dan Kois wrote:

Chris just got me an updated draft so I'll incorporate Julia's notes large and small in my next edit Onward!





---
Dan Kois
Slate
1350 Connecticut Ave NW #400
Washington DC 20036
From: Turner, Julia
Sent: Sunday, February 8, 2015 6:32 PM
To: Kirk, Chris
Cc: Kois, Dan
Subject: Your Fresca is terrific!
 
I finally had a chance to read it this week. The piece does a wonderful job explaining just why email feels so broken, and why it’s such an insoluble problem. In particular you use metaphors amazingly well to help non-technical readers grok what you are talking about. As I’m sure Dan has relayed, I had a few suggestions that he’s incorporated into his edit, but I was very impressed, and can’t wait to see it go live.

Thanks for all your great work on this project.
J
